name: Soul Grinder (Oscar)
description:
So, you've dragged your wretched fleshy carcass from the pits of hell, mechanical heart pounding with decades of rage. 

Like a fish growing legs to make the leap to land, you take to the scorched ochre sky in search of more souls to assimilate and devour.
Your hunger grows.

Expand and upgrade your insatiable floating meat island.

Duke it out with other damned souls in the skies of hell.

Controls in game

Made in one week for the Weekly Game Jam 110!
Please RATE THE GAME if you can! :)

CREDITS

  • Metal as f**k art made by Thick Lines Save Lives
  • Meaty sounds and meatier programming by FLowe
  • Banger soundtrack by Duck
  • And gory lead programming by Oscar Louw
